name: Butterfly Canyon
description:
Introduction

All Kaibeto area canyons are closed to visitation of any kind. These closures are documented in Michael Kelsey's book Technical Slot Canyon Guide to the Colorado Plateau and on the Navajo Parks and Recreation Department website here:https://navajonationparks.org/rules-regulations/. Visitation to all Kaibeto area canyons is considered trespassing and is illegal.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
